Name: OpenVTT
About the game: OpenVTT is a Virtual Tabletop platform that focuses on modularity and customization. That means for example that the handouts are customizable, allowing you to change and design your own handout designs. OpenVTTâ€™s vision is to be a Virtual Tabletop for most if not all TTRPGS, offering a free version with the base functionalities needed by most and with a selection of Premium features, that as needed for a one-time price. Removing the hassle of having to pay high prices or monthly subscriptions, to play a simple pen and paper game digitally.
